alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 27 at 1:00PM MST until November 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, except 2 to 11 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The eastern and southeaster highlands, from the Montana border to north of Bear Lake Basin. This includes the towns of Wayan, Swan Valley, Victor, Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, Island Park, and Kilgore. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and drifting snow could make travel difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley
